convicted_cases.case_no: CC No 768/2014, FIR No 218/2011, Denduluru PS
convicted_cases.other_details_or_acts_sections_applicabl: Section 7(1) of Criminal Law Amendment Act
convicted_cases.punishment_imposed: Sentenced to Undergo Rigorous Imprisonment for a Period of Six Months & Fine of Rs 1000/- of The Offence Under Sec. 353 IPC, Further Sentenced to Undergo Rigorous Imprisonment for a Period of Two Years and Fine of Rs 1000/- For The Offence Under Sec. 506(2) IPC and Further Sentenced to Undergo Rigorous Imprisonment For a Period of Six Months And Fine of Rs 500/- For The Offence Under Section 7/1 of Criminal Law Amendment Act, All The Sentenced Shall Run Concurrently in Default of Payment of Fine Shall Undergo Simple Imprisonment For One Month
convicted_cases.details_and_present_status_of_appeal: Coming for Hearing, The Sentence Passed By The Honble Judicial Magistrate of 1st Class Bhimadole Was Suspended By The Honble 1st Additional District & Sessions Judge, Eluru vide. Crlmp No 148/18, Dated 07.03.2018 Pending Disposal of The Main Appeal, The Conviction Imposed By The Honble Judicial Magistrate of 1st Class, Bhimadole Was Suspended By The Honble High Court of Judicature at Hyderabad For The State of Telangana & The State of Andhra Pradesh vide Criminal Petition No 3249/2018, Date 16.03.2018, Pending Disposal of The Main Appeal Before The Court of Session Hence, Teh Conviction And Also The Sentence Imposed Are Not In Operation, Present Status is For Hearing of Arguments
